snippet.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
How I wonder what you are.
Wishlist now on steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2422770/Twinkle_Twinkle_Little_Star/?beta=0
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star is a 6-color pixel horror adventure game set in an abandoned space station. Seek the origin of cosmic monsters left by astronauts before you.

Based loosely on the classic nursery rhyme, this game takes place in the flagship station of IPR (Inter-Planetary Relations,) the Bilai. The Bilai ceased communications two months ago, and you alone are being sent to find out why.

Upon arrival, you're greeting with empty rooms and faulty power. Something has very clearly gone wrong, you'll have to track down someone who can answer for this. Assuming anyone's still alive, that is.
